meanings.definition: A container for holding waste materials.
meanings.sent1: I threw the crumpled paper into the wastebasket.
meanings.sent2: The office has a wastebasket by each desk for trash.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the wastebasket was a new hiding spot for toys.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a wastebasket overflowing with thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The metal wastebasket gleamed under the fluorescent lights.

meanings.sent1: The janitor emptied the wastebasket into the larger bin.
meanings.sent2: She found a lost earring at the bottom of the wastebasket.
meanings.sent3: The wastebasket became a treasure trove of forgotten trinkets.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a wastebasket full of broken dreams.
meanings.sent5: The colorful wastebasket added a pop of color to the room.
